articles.description: England produce their best performance of the T20 World Cup so far to begin the Super 8s stage with a composed eight-wicket win against West Indies.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: England cruise to victory against West Indies

articles.description: Scotland show their best qualities - as well as their worst - to get their Euro 2024 campaign back on track, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scotland find themselves in draw with Switzerland

articles.description: Germany's Jamal Musiala puts in another strong performance as he continues to dazzle for his country at Euro 2024 on home soil.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'Starboy' Jamal Musiala told to 'enjoy his football'

articles.description: Farzad Mansouri was the teenage flagbearer for his nation at the last Olympics. Three years on, displaced by war and relocated to Manchester, he will compete under a new banner in Paris.
articles.title: Olympic refugee team: Farzad Mansouri on his Kabul-Britain journey

articles.description: BBC Sport tells you the things to look out for in this summer's Copa America in the United States.
articles.title: Copa America 2024: Messi, Vinicius Jr, Bielsa, Brazil, Argentina, USA

articles.description: Albania have shown they did not come to Euro 2024 to make up the numbers after a dramatic draw left Croatia's golden generation of players on the brink of an early exit.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Albania joy as Croatia's golden era on brink

articles.description: Gareth Southgate says England must not take major tournaments wins for granted, ahead of facing Denmark at Euro 2024.
articles.title: England should not take tournament wins for granted - Southgate

articles.description: Line-ups, preview, and predictions as Scotland prepare to face Switzerland in their second group game of Euro 2024 in Cologne.
articles.title: Scotland vs Switzerland: UEFA Euro 2024 - line-ups, score and updates

articles.description: Andy Murray is forced to stop against Australia's Jordan Thompson in what is likely to be his final appearance at Queen's.
articles.title: Andy Murray retires injured in likely final Queen's appearance

articles.description: Steve Bunce runs rule over IBF's looming decision over whether to strip heavyweight champion Oleksandr Usyk of his belt.
articles.title: Steve Bunce: Oleksandr Usyk's battle with IBF represents power struggle in boxing
